About.title: About Me
About.p1: I’m a computer engineering student and software development intern focused on building clean, scalable mobile apps using Flutter. I enjoy turning ideas into real products and constantly improving my skills.
About.p2: Currently, I'm diving deeper into Clean Architecture, State Management, and advanced UI patterns to deliver high-quality user experiences.

items.title: Kriptum
items.description: Kriptum is a wallet application (Hot Wallet) inspired by the Metamask mobile app, it allows the creation of wallets, transfer of the native network currency, and balance checking. It was built in Flutter and Dart, using the web3dart library to interact with the blockchain. The app is a simplified version of Metamask.

items.title: Metronome
items.description: Metronome was created to offer a "clean," uninterrupted experience. Just open it, set the tempo, and start practicing. No in-app purchases, no pop-ups, and no complicated features. Just what you need to master your rhythm
